entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as a person who told Harry that they were ambushed.

entities.name: nymphadora
entities.description: Nymphadora is mentioned as the daughter of Mrs. Tonks and she is missing.

entities.name: ted
entities.description: Ted is mentioned as a person who exchanged looks with Mrs. Tonks.

entities.name: dora
entities.description: Dora (Tonks) is mentioned as a skilled Auror and Harry's friend.

entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as Dora's husband.

entities.name: burrow
entities.description: The Burrow is mentioned as a location where Harry and his friends need to go.

entities.name: portkey
entities.description: The Portkey is mentioned as an object that will take Harry and his friends back to the Burrow.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Nymphadora's safety.
Ted reassures Dora that she will be okay.
Harry plans to use the Portkey to get back to the Burrow.
Tonks is located at the Burrow.
